item.description:
I always get these questions
"how did you do that"
"I took this great shot but I don't know what to do with it in photoshop"
"Can you show me how to................"

Well now its your chance to get your questions answered. At this workshop YOU bring the images and Kent and I will show you what we would do to bring your image to the next level or to answer how to get what you are looking for in your final image.

Bring your images on a flash card or usb and your questions and we will give you a finished image and answers to your questions.

Cost is $25 to attend

Bring a notebook to take notes
Limited space for laptops
item.why: Learn how to take your images to the next level using photoshop and lightroom
item.name: What would Kent and Jason do?
